con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ws.apache.org/axis2" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:axis2="http://ws.apache.org/axis2" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/"> <wsdl:documentation/> <wsdl:types/> <wsdl:message name=""/> <wsdl:portType name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="processDocument"> <wsdl:input message="axis2:null" wsaw:Action="urn:processDocument"/> <wsdl:output message="axis2:null" wsaw:Action="urn:processDocumentResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesSoap11Binding" type="axis2:OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesPortType"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesSoap12Binding" type="axis2:OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesPortType"> <soap12:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpBinding" type="axis2:OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesPortType"> <http:binding verb="POST"/> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfaces"> <wsdl:port name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpSoap11Endpoint" binding="axis2:OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesSoap11Binding"> <soap:address location="http://10.19.12.56:80/meaweb/services/OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfaces.OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpSoap11Endpoint/"/> </wsdl:port> <wsdl:port name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpSoap12Endpoint" binding="axis2:OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesSoap12Binding"> <soap12:address location="http://10.19.12.56:80/meaweb/services/OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfaces.OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpSoap12Endpoint/"/> </wsdl:port> <wsdl:port name="OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpEndpoint" binding="axis2:OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpBinding"> <http:address location="http://10.19.12.56:80/meaweb/services/OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfaces.OEBS_BGIVENDORInterfacesHttpEndpoint/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:config.script:
/*
SOA Testing Framework Domain: Database
Script functionality description: Connect to the database defined in XML framework configuration file based on database identificator atribute. Aanalyses defined object (table/view/materia- lized view) physical structure and generate INSERT statement for single row with randomly generated values.
Limitations: If the VARCHAR/VARCHAR2 size is bigger than 100 characters, the random generator reduce the size to 100. This is configurable in XML file. */
import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.DATABASE import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.DB_GENERATE_INSERT_ONE_ROW_RANDOM import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.DB_EXECUTE_INSERT_FROM_FILE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(DATABASE, "VendorContactsDB", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(DB_GENERATE_INSERT_ONE_ROW_RANDOM) log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.OSB import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.OSB_DISABLE_SERVICE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent osbComponent = SOATFCompFactory.buildSOATFComponent(OSB, "VendorContactsMaintainFromEBS_047C_prequeue_listener", componentOperationResult) osbComponent.execute(OSB_DISABLE_SERVICE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_PURGE_QUEUE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_VendorContacts_prequeue_O47C", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(JMS_PURGE_QUEUE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.DATABASE import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.DB_EXECUTE_INSERT_FROM_FILE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(DATABASE, "VendorContactsDB", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(DB_EXECUTE_INSERT_FROM_FILE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_READ_ALL_MESSAGES_IN_QUEUE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_VendorContacts_prequeue_O47C", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(JMS_READ_ALL_MESSAGES_IN_QUEUE)
assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage() log.info( componentOperationResult.toString())

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_VALIDATE_MESSAGE_FILES import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_VendorContacts_prequeue_O47C", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(JMS_VALIDATE_MESSAGE_FILES)
assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage() log.info( componentOperationResult.toString())

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.MAPPING import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.MAPPING_VALIDATE_SCENARIO import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(MAPPING, "Validate_VendorContactDB_with_queue_047C_message", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(MAPPING_VALIDATE_SCENARIO)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.OSB import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.OSB_DISABLE_SERVICE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent osbComponent = SOATFCompFactory.buildSOATFComponent(OSB, "VendorsSitesAndContactsPS_masterqueue_listener", componentOperationResult) osbComponent.execute(OSB_DISABLE_SERVICE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_PURGE_QUEUE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_master_queue_047C", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(JMS_PURGE_QUEUE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.OSB import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.OSB_ENABLE_SERVICE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent osbComponent = SOATFCompFactory.buildSOATFComponent(OSB, "VendorContactsMaintainFromEBS_047C_prequeue_listener", componentOperationResult) osbComponent.execute(OSB_ENABLE_SERVICE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_CHECK_ERROR_QUEUE_FOR_MESSAGES import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent osbComponent = SOATFCompFactory.buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_VendorContacts_prequeue_O47C", componentOperationResult) osbComponent.execute(JMS_CHECK_ERROR_QUEUE_FOR_MESSAGES)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_READ_ALL_MESSAGES_IN_QUEUE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_master_queue_047C", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(JMS_READ_ALL_MESSAGES_IN_QUEUE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_VALIDATE_MESSAGE_FILES import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_master_queue_047C", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(JMS_VALIDATE_MESSAGE_FILES)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.MAPPING import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.MAPPING_VALIDATE_SCENARIO import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent dbComponent = SOATFCompFactory. buildSOATFComponent(MAPPING, "Validate_047C_with_master_queue", componentOperationResult) dbComponent.execute(MAPPING_VALIDATE_SCENARIO)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.OSB import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.OSB_ENABLE_SERVICE import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent osbComponent = SOATFCompFactory.buildSOATFComponent(OSB, "VendorsSitesAndContactsPS_masterqueue_listener", componentOperationResult) osbComponent.execute(OSB_ENABLE_SERVICE)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

import static ibm.soatest.SOATFCompType.JMS import static ibm.soatest.CompOperType.JMS_CHECK_ERROR_QUEUE_FOR_MESSAGES import ibm.soatest.SOATFCompFactory import ibm.soatest.SOATFComponent import ibm.soatest.CompOperResult
CompOperResult componentOperationResult = new CompOperResult() SOATFComponent osbComponent = SOATFCompFactory.buildSOATFComponent(JMS, "IWCommonJMSServer_master_queue_047C", componentOperationResult) osbComponent.execute(JMS_CHECK_ERROR_QUEUE_FOR_MESSAGES)
log.info( componentOperationResult.toString()) assert true == componentOperationResult.isOverallResultSuccess() : componentOperationResult.getResultMessage()

con:testSuite.name: Scenario QEQE: Pool JMS Queue -> JMS Queue
Scenario QEDB: Pool JMS Queue -> Database
Scenario QEFTP: Pool JMS Queue -> Ftp
Scenario QEFILE: Pool JMS Queue -> File
Scenario FTPQE: Pool Ftp -> JMS Queue
Scenario FLQE: Pool File -> JMS Queue
Scenario SPXDB: Invoke SOAP Proxy -> Database
Scenario SPXQE: Invoke SOAP Proxy -> JMS Queue
Scenario SPXFTP: Invoke SOAP Proxy -> Ftp
Scenario SPXFL: Invoke SOAP Proxy -> File

con:eventHandlers.name: TestRunListener.afterStep
con:eventHandlers.con:script: filePath = 'c:/Dev/' fos = new FileOutputStream( filePath + testStepResult.testStep.label + '.txt', true ) pw = new PrintWriter( fos ) testStepResult.writeTo( pw ) pw.close() fos.close()
